content.rendered: Just wanted to say Thanks for an awesome rafting trip on Wed 6/9. For 1st timers, we didn’t know what to expect. We are from Texas and our guide, Heidi, paired us up with another group from Texas. Heidi was fantastic and fun… We are planning to return next year and actually looking into going to West Virginia to try a trip that Heidi recommended….. We will tell all our friends what a Class Operation you run…Brown Canyon is an awesome trip…..                                                                        Thanxx  Laura, Tony, Tyler
